collection:
Purpose and scope of customer information collection

**The main data collection on Mojo AI website includes: Name, email, phone
number of customers in Profile section.

This is the information that Mojo AI
needs customers to provide when sending a request for advice or want to use
the service and for Mojo AI to contact and confirm with customers to ensure
the interests of customers.

The collection and use of information of each
customer is done only with the consent of that customer, unless otherwise
provided for by law.

Customers when registering and purchasing the service must provide all
relevant personal information such as: Full name, email, phone number ... and
be responsible for the legality of the above information.

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the
comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string
to help spam detection.

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email
address and website in cookies.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login
information and your screen display choices.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional
third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content,
including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an
account and are logged in to that website.
sharing:
Do not use, transfer, provide or disclose to any third parties personal
information and customer data for commercial purposes.
